original_text: When her owners realized that their hope of making money was gone, they seized Paul and Silas and dragged them into the marketplace to face the authorities.
korean_text: 여종의 주인들은 자기 수익의 소망이 끊어진 것을 보고 바울과 실라를 붙잡아 장터로 관리들에게 끌어 갔다가

sentences.original_text: that their hope of making money was gone
sentences.korean_translation: 돈을 벌겠다는 그들의 희망이 사라졌다는 것을

sentences.original_text: and dragged them into the marketplace
